itunes:title: 304 - Sick of Nothing Working on Social Media? Try These 3 Surprising Strategies
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
Nothing makes me feel like giving up like when my efforts seem to make no difference. It’s maddening when your efforts don’t equal results, especially when it comes to social media.

We all know that social media can really positively impact your creative practice, but more often than not, it can feel like it’s just not working for us and the time and energy we pour into these channels seems to have little or no return on investment.

If you’ve been fed up with how your progress on social media has plateaued, and you feel like calling it quits - this episode is for you!

In this episode you’ll get 3 totally different ways of approaching your work online that will help you shake things up and start making real meaningful progress again.

Listen & Subscribe on Apple Podcasts
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/creative-pep-talk/id929743897 

Get Episode Transcripts at creative-pep-talk.simplecast.com
